short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Revert closed GitHub issues from purple back to red.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supports all GitHub themes.

 • Issues
 • Pulls
 • Discussions
 • Hovercards
 • Tasklists
 • Search
 • Subscriptions
 • Project boards
 • Project tables

Please report issues using the link in the support tab.
